sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with chan hou zhong feng 產後中風 , wind stroke following delivery. Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 Lj: 產後風續續數十日不解，頭微痛，惡寒，時時有熱，心下 悶，乾嘔，汗出，雖久，陽旦證續在耳，可與陽旦湯 , “If wind following delivery continues for tens of days without being resolved, with a slight headache, an aversion to cold and repeated heat spells, heart pressure below the heart, dry vomiting, and sweating, then even though this has existed for some time already, it is still a ‘sunrise’ condition. [Patients] are to be given a ‘sunrise decoction’”. [Note: ‘Sunrise decoction’, yang dan tang 陽旦湯 , is another name of gui zhi tang 桂枝湯 , decoction with gui zhi 桂枝 .]
